## BasicAuthenticator.(constructor)

Create a new BasicAuthenticator instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(options: Options);
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

options


</td><td>

Options


</td><td>

Configuration options for basic authentication. This should be an object containing these fields: - username: the username portion of basic authentication - password: the password portion of basic authentication


</td></tr>

## Exceptions

Error: the configuration options are not valid.
